long_description: The Diamondback Insight STI-8 Bike offers a comfortable, convenient and efficient platform, all with an internally geared 8-speed hub, making it great for everyday riding, commuting and more. Sturdy and efficient butted aluminum frame provides a comfortable upright ride, reducing body strains and enhancing visibility. Shimano Nexus internally geared rear hub provides 8 smooth-shifting gears to comfortably cruise cities and paths; twist-grip shifter changes gears with a flick of a wrist. Internally geared hubs are relatively maintenance-free compared to derailleur-and-cassette systems. Linear-pull brakes offer easy speed management. Speedy 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda Kwik Trax tires for low rolling resistance and comfortable handling. Diamondback Performance Hybrid seat features gel padding for extended comfort in the saddle. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack for added utility (not included). Specs on the Diamondback Insight STI-8 hybrid bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Diamondback Insight STI-8 Bike offers a comfortable, convenient and efficient platform, all with an internally geared 8-speed hub, making it great for everyday riding, commuting and more.
